## Description and Rationale

We're from Ryanair Labs MAD data team and we like a good Engineering challenge!

## Details

* Type: Industry
* Country: Spain

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(gt)

gt(tibble::tribble(
  ~id, ~forename,        ~surname, ~affiliation,
   1L,    "Igor", "Pereira Gomes",    "Ryanair",
   2L,   "Diogo",         "Souza",    "Ryanair"
  )
) |>   cols_label(id = md("**ID**"), forename = md("**Forename**"), surname ~ md("**Surname**"), affiliation ~ md("**Affiliation**"))
```
